```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r, echo = F, message = F, warning = F}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```

```{r, message = F, warning = F, echo = F}
superstore <- read_csv("Superstore_data.csv") %>% 
  clean_names()

superstore %>% 
  naniar::miss_var_summary()
```

After a quick scan of the data, it seems that there is no missingness for any of the variables. 

```{r, message = F, warning = F, echo = F}
ggplot(superstore, aes(x = state)) +
  geom_bar() +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_minimal()
```
